McGowan narrows her eyes.

McGowan: Well, Shitrons! I guess this dumbass is=
n't worth saving.

McGowan starts to pull the trigger on her gun with the n=
ozzle pressed to Brown's head.

Alba throws Pink on the ground.

McGowan: H=
ey. Pick it back up.

Alba ignores McGowan.

McGowan: You need to-

Alba: N=
o! McGowan, we should have stayed with the Chivtrons!

McGowan smiles and l=
aughs some.

McGowan: What's that mean?

Alba: I don't know....But this isn=
't working.

McGowan: What do you mean? Look.

McGowan points to White's co=
rpse.

McGowan: I killed her. It is working.

Virgo stared at Alba, feeling=
 trigger happy at the moment. Depp and Lee were ready to step forward when =
told.

McGowan: Depp, get the robot.

Depp lifts Pink from the ground and h=
olds his kitana to her throat. She wakes up but doesn't try to free herself=
.

Alba: I guess I'll give it some time...

Lee fires off 5 fireballs, aimi=
ng for the chivtron base. Papertron fires of 2 missiles towards the Chivtro=
n base. Birdbot lights the fuse of a bundle of dynamite and tosses it near =
the Chivtron base and watches the fuse while growling. Barrymore fires at t=
he Chivtron base twice.

McGowan: Shitrons! See it with your own eyes!

McG=
owan points at Depp. Depp holds Pink in front of himself by her arm. She re=
aches for her rifle by Depp cuts her arm off and stabs her in the stomach.
=

Alba turns, aiming her gun at McGowan.

Alba: I gave it enough time.

McGo=
wan: Alba, I never did like you.

Alba shoots McGowan in the shoulder inste=
ad of the head. She shoots her in the chest twice before McGowan grabs her =
by the neck. Alba fires at McGowan but misses. McGowan grabs ahold of Alba'=
s gun and jerks it from her grip. Alba coughs and struggles to no avail. Mc=
Gowan tightens her grip. Depp spears Pink through the stomach on his kitana=
 and holds her high in the air. McGowan snaps Alba's neck, dropping her. Vi=
rgo looks at the Insecticons.

Virgo: Kill them....

Virgo spoke in a faint=
 whisper while pointing to the Chivtron base....

  From: Catchphrase: DOCTOR MARIO!!!!!!!!! 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
  Sent: Wednesday, January 16, 2002 12:14 AM
  Subject: Re: War in Chi=
vtrons Base.


  The Insecticons arrive at the scene of the battle.

  Veno=
m: Hmm.

  Shrapnel: Which side do we attack?

  Barrage: Make it both.

  =
Ransack: I second that.

  Shrapnel: Wait, maybe we can decide whose side w=
ould best suit us by how they act and what they say.

  Venom: I second tha=
t one. All in favor of waiting for their actions to decide who we help and =
who we destroy, say aye. Those opposed say nay

  Shrapnel: Aye

  Bombshel=
l: ...

  Kickback: Maybe we can trick them first, pretend to be on their s=
ide and turn on them, or make them do our bidding by blackmailing them.

  =
Bombshell: I have cerebro shells that do that.

  Chop Shop: As long as the=
re's something to steal, I'm alright with it.

  Venom: Okay, we're going w=
ith Shrapnel's idea, then, I'm not waiting all day and neither or any of yo=
u!

  They watch the battle...

    From:=

ry 15, 2002 3:46 PM
    Subject: Re: War in Chivtrons Base.


    ::Aerotau=
r:: 
          He shrugs and hits a few keys bringing it up on a screen.  H=
e sighs. "It's them again.  And Virgo."  He shakes his head.  "Maybe they'l=
l just go away if we stay inside."
